Looks like com.ibm.etools.webtools.flatui.FlatPageSection does not unhook 
itself as a property listener, and, in response to a FontRegistry change, ends 
up referring to a disposed widget.
This class is not in the Eclipse SDK.
Paula or Felix, could you please enter a PR on the WSAD side?

We have also made some improvements to error handling recently.

Should try to make the prefs page more resilient to failure of specific pages, 
e.g. use SafeRunnables.

Actually it's not the pref page sending the callback here, it's the font 
registry.
Should try to be more resilient.

Changed the font registry so that the listeners are only notified if the font 
value is set rather than initialized.

There is no API change but put(String,FontData) now calls put
(String,FontData,boolean) with boolean set to true (boolean determines if 
listeners are notified). 

createFont now calls (String,FontData,boolean) with boolean set to false so 
that updates are not fired on lookup.
